data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Marcos De Oliveira awards Orlando a goal kick.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Orlando at Exploria Stadium.
Can Nashville get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orlando's half?
Abu Danladi for Nashville gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 3, Ball goes out of play for a Orlando goal kick.
Throw-in for Nashville in their own half.
Throw-in Nashville.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Nashville in the half of Orlando.
Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Orlando Nashville attack through Abu Danladi. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 6, Orlando have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Orlando.
Orlando to take a throw-in in Nashville territory.
In the minute 10, Orlando awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Orlando.
Orlando are coming forward and Daryl Dike gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 12, Goal kick for Nashville at Exploria Stadium.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Nashville in the half of Orlando.
Nashville's Dave Romney scores with his head to give his side a 0-1 lead.
Great play from Hany Mukhtar to set up the goal.
Marcos De Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
Nashville's Abu Danladi breaks free at Exploria Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 19, Goal kick for Orlando at Exploria Stadium.
Orlando pushes forward through Nani, whose finish on goal is saved.
Orlando push forward at Exploria Stadium and Daryl Dike gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Nashville defence.
In the minute 21, Chris Mueller scores with his head for Orlando to level the match at 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Joao Moutinho.
Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
In the minute 24, Nashville's Daniel Rios is on target but unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Nashville is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nashville needs to be cautious. Orlando have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 28, Marcos De Oliveira signals a Orlando throw-in in Nashville's half.
Throw-in Nashville.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 29, Nashville's Daniel Rios gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Orlando.
Joao Moutinho gets his shot on target but fails to score for Orlando.
In the minute 31, Abu Danladi (Nashville) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Randall Leal of Nashville smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Jhegson Mendez for Orlando gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 32, Marcos De Oliveira awards Nashville a goal kick.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a Nashville throw-in in Orlando's half.
Orlando have a goal kick.
In the minute 37, Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Orlando.
Ball goes out of play for a Nashville goal kick.
Free kick Nashville.
In the minute 39, In Orlando a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
In the minute 43, Orlando have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
Jalil Anibaba (Nashville) has received a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Orlando.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
In the minute 44, Joao Moutinho (Orlando) has received a yellow card from Marcos De Oliveira.
Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
Throw-in for Orlando in their own half.
Throw-in for Orlando close to the penalty box.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half is underway at Exploria Stadium.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Nashville at Exploria Stadium.
Alistair Johnston is replacing Jalil Anibaba for Nashville at Exploria Stadium.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a throw-in for Nashville, close to Orlando's area.
Nashville drive upfield and Hany Mukhtar gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Orlando defender.
In the minute 48, Orlando's Daryl Dike gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Nashville defender.
Orlando have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
Ball goes out of play for a Nashville goal kick.
In the minute 50, Ball safe as Nashville is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Orlando.
Throw-in high up the field for Nashville in Orlando.
In the minute 52, Daryl Dike puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
Mauricio Pereyra instrumental with a fine assist.
Orlando's Daryl Dike is whistled for offside at Exploria Stadium.
In the minute 55, Important block from the Orlando defence as Daniel Rios fires in a strike for Nashville.
Marcos De Oliveira awards the home team a throw-in.
Nashville drives forward and Hany Mukhtar gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 57, Can Nashville capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Orlando's half?
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
Nashville drive into the zone and Randall Leal is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
In the minute 62, Nashville have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
Nashville have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Nashville.
In the minute 64, Orlando to take a throw-in in Nashville territory.
The away team have replaced Abu Danladi with Dominique Badji. This is the fourth substitution made today by Gary Smith.
Derrick Jones is replacing Hany Mukhtar for the away team.
In the minute 65, The away team replace Daniel Rios with Alex Muyl.
Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
Orlando make their first substitution with Junior Urso replacing Jhegson Mendez.
In the minute 67, Andres Perea is on a sub for Oriol Rosell for Orlando.
Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daryl Dike is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 70, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Dominique Badji (Nashville) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 71, Orlando’s Daryl Dike is on his feet again at Exploria Stadium.
Goal! Orlando extend their lead to 3-1 through Daryl Dike.
Goal kick for Nashville at Exploria Stadium.
In the minute 75, Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
Nashville's Alex Muyl attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Marcos De Oliveira awards Orlando a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Gary Smith (Nashville) is making a fifth substitution, with David Accam replacing Anibal Godoy.
Benji Michel is on a sub for Mauricio Pereyra for Orlando.
Can Orlando get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nashville's half?
In the minute 80, Orlando drives forward and Daryl Dike gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Orlando.
Orlando's Junior Urso goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Nashville in the half of Orlando.
Attention is being given to Nashville’s Walker Zimmerman and play has been suspended briefly.
Benji Michel for Orlando has been booked by Marcos De Oliveira and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 84, Nashville's Dominique Badji breaks free at Exploria Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Orlando have a goal kick.
Walker Zimmerman for Nashville is back on the field again.
In the minute 85, Oscar Pareja (Orlando) is making a fifth substitution, with Kamal Miller replacing Joao Moutinho.
Oscar Pareja is making the team's fourth substitution at Exploria Stadium with Kyle Smith replacing Chris Mueller.
Free kick for Orlando in the half of Nashville.
In the minute 89, Nashville have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
Orlando awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a throw-in for Orlando, close to Nashville's area.
Orlando drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Marcos De Oliveira will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Nashville just outside Orlando's area.
Nashville have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
Ball safe as Nashville is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Orlando.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 3-1.
Alistair Johnston (Nashville) gets a yellow card.
